channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Peter Thiel-backed venture debt firm Tacora raises $268.7M for new fund
item.description: Tacora Capital has raised its second fund, after Peter Thiel backed its first fund with $250 million. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For pers...

item.title: Cloudflare’s VPN app among half-dozen pulled from Indian app stores
item.description: More than half-a-dozen VPN apps, including Cloudflare’s widely-used 1.1.1.1, have been pulled from India’s Apple App Store and Google Play Store follo...

item.title: Hindustan Unilever in talks to acquire Peak XV-backed Minimalist for up to $350M
item.description: Consumer goods giant Hindustan Unilever is in advanced talks to acquire four-year-old direct-to-consumer startup Minimalist for up to $350 million, ac...

item.title: Facebook and Instagram Ads Push Gun Silencers Disguised as Car Parts
item.description: A network of Facebook pages has been advertising “fuel filters” that are actually meant to be used as silencers, which are heavily regulated by US law...

item.title: How to watch CES 2025’s press conferences
item.description: CES 2025 kicks off January 7. The annual Las Vegas event sets the tone for the year’s consumer electronics and automotive industries. As always, TechC...

item.title: The 45 Best Shows on Max (aka HBO Max) Right Now (January 2025)
item.description: Somebody Somewhere, Dune: Prophecy, and The Sex Lives of College Girls are just a few of the shows you need to be watching on Max this month.

item.title: The Death of Net Neutrality Is a Bad Omen

item.title: Editors at Science Journal Resign En Masse Over Bad Use of AI, High Fees

item.title: Dictatorships Will Be Vulnerable to Algorithms
item.description: It may seem like a perfect fit: dispassionate software that streamlines the agendas of dastardly regimes. But they’ll find that the tech cuts both way...

item.title: Nvidia’s CES 2025 keynote: How to watch
